Desc.eng: Who said you can’t? I don’t need money, I want you to save my master!
That will be quite a meal.
And who would your master be?

He is the Beggar King! Our protector! The Lord of the Lost Tunnels! Umm.. he needs some protection of his own these days. He was a powerful man once, but that mad scientist wants to see him dead. Could you help him?
The enemy of my enemy is my friend. Where can I find him?
He fled to the depths of the Ink. You’ll need this amulet to enter his hiding place. Good luck!
I’m sorry, but I can’t do that. I have a whole town to resuce first.
Stranger, I beg you! I’m starving!
Here, 50 gold pieces. Eat something and buy some clothes.
You are a kind soul, stranger. Just like my master.
And who would your master be?

He is the Beggar King! Our protector! The Lord of the Lost Tunnels! Umm.. he needs some protection of his own these days. He was a powerful man once, but that mad scientist wants to see him dead. Could you help him?
The enemy of my enemy is my friend. Where can I find him?
He fled to the depths of the Ink. You’ll need this amulet to enter his hiding place. Good luck!
I’m sorry, but I can’t do that. I have a whole town to rescue first.
